item.name: Users

response.name: Register User with already set email
Login User with wrong password
Login User with unregistered email

item.description:
This folder contains all the APIs regarding users.

- Register User
    
- Login User
    
- Logout User
    
- Get profile of authorized user
    
- Change password for authorized user
    
- Update profile of authorized user
    
- Delete the authorized user's profile

item.name: Weather
Get weather for current user location

response.name: Get weather for current user location

Error searching wrong name of city

item.description:
This folder contains all the APIs concerning the weather.

- Get weather of current user's location saved in database.
    
- Search for weather:
    
    - Search for weather using city name.
        
    - Search for weather using latitude and longitude.
        
- Add city to user's favorites list.
    
- Favorite Cities:
    
    - Get the authorized user's favorite cities list.
        
    - Get the weather of authorized user's favorite cities.
        
- 5 Recent Searched Cities:
    
    - Get the 5 recent searched cities list of authorized user.
        
    - Get the weather of the 5 recent cities of authorized user.

response.name: Api Home
